author: Kristine-Bating
comment: I searched for 2 days to find a good note and then i found this. I am greatful! Man, the search was very tiring!! I hope you guys do well in the future. In fact, the app is good! Just a little suggestion, can you guys make a thumbnail view of the notes? It would be awesome since some people love squares/rectangles (I love it). The tagging is good but I think foldrs/ntbks is muchmuch better. It would be great if u can enable/disable the time and dates displayed on the notes. And themes. And fonts too.
title: So far I am loving this app

author: Benjamín Castillo
comment: I'm rating it 2 stars though, because it has dealbreaker bugs for me (I bought premium)... Calendar doesn't save notes! (this is the main premium feature, so it NEEDS to be fixed asap). It also as a bug where tag synchronizations between two devices doesn't occur (save one tag in a phone, it doesn't show up in your tablet). Really nice app, anyway: material design, beautiful transitions, tags, CALENDAR... I mean, what else could you ask? Please please fix it
title: It's one of the bests note taking apps...

author: Yamen Sharaf
comment: I know the competition is tough out there, but I hope it doesn't mean you'll give up. People look for alternatives all the time. I hope there would be a folder/category view alongside tags. I would be sold. Also Google Drive sync would be much neater. When clicking on a note it should open in view mode with a FAB button for editing.
title: Exactly what I need. A simple and neat note taking app

author: Mike Hampshire
comment: Very professional minimal design.  Needs two things: sync across android and full white background for a resized widget even if the widget is not full. Like the Google mail widget. If both of these can be done, it's better than Keep.
title: Simple - that's good

author: Bram iBam
comment: 1. In list note, we only can add new list item from buttom, the problem is, if we create many item list, when we open, start from the top. We have to scroll down. 2. The checked list item can't move automaticaly. 3 need spesific note item on widget
title: Need more automatic list feature

author: Ben Wilson
comment: I love this note taking app. It's my go to note and list app and I use it every day for work. I love the simplicity and also the material design. I find it so much faster to use Bluenote to jump in and create a quick list or note as opposed to something like Evernote which has so many options and setting that it just becomes over complicated.
title: Favorite note/list/Todo app on android

author: Robert Alexandre
comment: Material Design implementation is nice but the app still needs basic features to be functional. For example, the reminders should include support for recurrence and this should be relatively easy to implement. There are many free apps that include this functionality.
title: Not a bad start..

author: Nakib Ahmed
comment: 2 types note, colour differences, tag and alarm - so cool. But if the alarm had vibration and stayed little longer on full screen, it would have been great.
title: Everything's great but expecting a little more

author: Becca Ladd
comment: I am thrilled to have found this app. I think it will end up replacing ALL my on the spot note taking apps.  *Update* Upgraded to premium on my tablet but am still getting ads on my phone.

reply.author: abhinav khanger
reply.content: You can synchronize your notes and to-do lists on multiple devices with Dropbox and its free .Just go to the settings and enable dropbox sync.

title: Best note app on the planet!!!

author: Nick Haug
comment: The plus sign "+" gets smaller when you go to the manage tags section of the app, not sure if you're aware of that, other than this great app!
title: Solid app, few minor bugs

author: Mark Young
comment: Used to use Google Keep -- but two big problems with that ... 1) Read the privacy agreement -- not much privacy and your data is on their servers.  2) After the latest Android Wear update, it stopped get new data from my phone -- so my watch and phone are out of sync.  With this app, it looks like all my data is local to my phone -- not on someone's server -- and the sync with my watch is working.  I love it!!!  Only thing I can't do is check or uncheck todo list items  -- on my watch -- but that's ok.
title: Great alternative to Google Keep!  Like this much better!

author: Paramjeet Singh
comment: Hi Abhi,  The app looks great and infact this is how Google Keep should look.  Is there any possibility of Syncing Notes with Gmail (Using Different Labels as we see in Gnotes app) ? If yes, it will be a great option for me and many other users as well.  Thanks for the great work.
title: Great Notes App

author: Braulio Ortiz Vazquez
comment: This app is very good. It has Material Design, looks great....but....the lack of calendar sync is a big mess to us!!!! maybe Keep has not the best UI but it's more powerful utility app.
title: Nice but...

author: Simon Bagg
comment: This app has one big flaw. If you accidentally back space over some text there is no way to undo or exit the note without saving. I have done this several times recently and it's very annoying. Apart from that I like the app.

author: Joshua Nieuwland
comment: I did use Keep because I couldn't find any good note apps, and then I found this on reddit, and I fell in love with it! Keep up the great work!
title: Good app

comment: There are small bugs , but it's ok, you will fix them in future. Can you include in next version : 24 hour clock and first day of week to be monday
title: I like it

author: mohammad esmaeilbeygi
comment: This is a very good application, simple ,fast and good UI I love it but unfortunately after i upgrade my android to 5 it doesn't work anymore I hope developer give new update fast
title: it's good but problem with android 5

author: Hooram Nam
comment: I've been waiting for a note app with the functions that come with this app.  Dropbox sync, tag support, reminders and even Markdown! I think it's a great start but the Dropbox sync seems to be broken. Good work! :)

reply.author: abhinav khanger
reply.content: Hi, can you email me about the Dropbox syncissue thanks.

title: Great!

author: Terence Percival
comment: It looks clean and easy to organize. The ability to sync to Dropbox and back up notes makes it harder to lose important notes. The only thing I feel it is missing is locking notes with passwords to hide important info.
title: It's good overall

author: Justin Hall
comment: I like this app A LOT, but I need reoccurring tasks. The UI is VERY appealing and the syncing option is welcomed.
title: Very Nice

author: alex lab
comment: Very comfortable app but it seems that it rather dead project than alive. And it is very sad
title: Good but Dead

author: Julie Hatton
comment: Very impressed. Wanted a non-fussy app that's simple to use yet versatile. This has it all. Offers various note formats, colour and tag, reminder and widget plus backup. Very nicely done.
title: Great contender to Keep and OneNote.

author: Timothy Zavarella
comment: A couple small design flaws but overall extremely well made!
title: Nice app

author: Ayman El Amrani
comment: Living the design, could be better if the option of adding a pin to enter app was added.
title: It's quite good!

author: ExploreWing
comment: ठीक है। इतना भी अच्छा नहीं जितना लोग कहते है। फिर भी सब की अपनी अपनी राय है। सिर्फ ड्रॉपबॉक्स क्लाउड? गूगल के साथ क्यों नहीं। TICK TICK बढ़िया है और फ्री भी है।
title: Bharat Gohil

author: Bradley Scalio
comment: The beta vers had no ads, I am all for free apps having ads, but I don't want ads in my apps
title: Great, but need ad-free version

author: Mel Parrish
comment: Easy to use and sync with Dropbox. All the features I need. love the tag support, and being able to sync. thanks for the great app.
title: Awesome Note taking app, finally!

author: Ryan Petrain
comment: The app is easy to use. Great look. Good set of features. Most of all, the developer is very responsive.
title: Great app

author: Leroy G.
comment: I paid for the premium version and my notes are not syncing properly between my tablet and phone... Is there a way to manually make the notes sync? I'm very saddened by this. I have drop box enabled.
title: Sync on Phone and Tablet

author: Brad Jolly
comment: So flexible, and the material design look is great. The tags are useful for searching and filtering. Developer continues to enhance an already great app
title: Great note app

author: Timothy Kurnia
comment: Doesn't overwhelm with too much features + have just what I need from a notes app.
title: Good, clean interface.

author: Jeffrey Cole
comment: Dropbox Sync seems to do nothing, even when successfully linked with Dropbox in the Premium version.

reply.author: abhinav khanger
reply.content: Dropbox Sync is free and can you email me about your issue thanks.

title: Ok

author: Tamir Offek
comment: But missing sort by reminder date and time.  And color for tags. And time picker with 24 instead of am pm
title: Nice

author: Bob Hagler
comment: Still testing it out but like everything so far like the way it connects with Dropbox
title: Like it

author: Ivan Tevano
comment: Can't insert image. No sharing collaborating. Computer app that sync with the notes.
title: Hello Blue notes!

author: Tun Lin Phyo
comment: I hope to get password and reading view. For edit I want editing icon.
title: Grate

author: Sulaiman Alhotan
comment: The best note app design in market, but if it support attachment it will be useful
title: The best

author: Vincent Ngase
comment: Hi, this is a great app. The dropbox sync is however not working..

reply.author: abhinav khanger
reply.content: Hi, Thanks for the review .Can you email me about the Dropbox sync issue thanks.

title: Great!

author: srp srp
comment: Can't import anything into the note

reply.author: abhinav khanger
reply.content: Hi, can you email me about your issue thanks.

author: J Nguyễn Knight
comment: Pretty but without calendar sync
